name: Grappling with School
description:
🔗 Grappling With School
A convoluted metaphor for dealing with school. The hook is of the grappling variety.

📘 Summary
Journey your way through deeper and deeper dungeons as you try to finish kill all assignments in each level in an increasingly convoluted metaphor for school. The only issue is that you can't kill assignments directly, and you can only use your trusty grappling hook.

🎮 Controls
- WASD for run + jump (and double jump)
- left click - grapple and ungrapple red grappling hook
- right click - grapple and ungrapple blue grappling hook

Made for TAGD's Spring 2022 Game Jame. Theme: "Descent into Madness"
